lead_paragraph: Notre Dame Coach Mike Brey turned to his associate coach, Sean Kearney, with about two minutes left in Notre Dame’s Big East tournament quarterfinal loss to Marquette on Thursday and asked a simple question: “How did we beat these guys once this season?”.
